attributes.action: urge Masterfoods not to use animal product rennet to make its chocolate products.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If Masterfoods continue with its plan to use rennet in its products, it would mean that products such as Mars bars, Twix, Maltesers, Snickers, Bounty, Minstrels, Milky Way etc would not be suitable for vegetarians.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
